医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究：薄而有弹性的皮肤可显着减轻穿刺造成的潜在损伤薄而有弹性的皮肤-；就像猪或人一样——；显着减少刺穿时发生的潜在损坏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Study-Thin-stretchy-skin-significantly-lessens-the-underlying-damage-from-puncture.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Study-Thin-stretchy-skin-significantly-lessens-the-underlying-damage-from-puncture.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78894542-59f0-4ec4-91ca-55e1ace26a56 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 22:48:23 -0400
新成像技术彻底改变了生物样品中微塑料的检测微塑料普遍存在于陆地和水生环境中，存在于从鱼类、植物到人类的多种生物体中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-imaging-technique-revolutionizes-micro Plastics-detection-in-biological-samples.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-imaging-technique-revolutionizes-micro Plastics-detection-in-biological-samples.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16cd4db5-2996-4c60-80ec-62b4aa67d0bb Mon, 28 Oct 2024 22:43:38 -0400 New imaging technique revolutionizes microplastics detection in biological samples
NCCN 公布健康公平报告卡工具的初步调查结果今天，国家综合癌症网络在美国公共卫生协会 (APHA) 年会和博览会期间展示了一项评估健康公平报告卡 (HERC) 工具可用性的研究的初步数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/NCCN-unveils-preliminary-findings-on-Health-Equity-Report-Card-tool.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/NCCN-unveils-preliminary-findings-on-Health-Equity-Report-Card-tool.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17017c6a-cd1e-4d54-b8cf-3a3beb30aaac Mon, 28 Oct 2024 22:38:13 -0400 NCCN unveils preliminary findings on Health Equity Report Card tool
研究确定了 H5N1 病毒的呼吸道传播潜力根据《自然》杂志上的一项新研究，从一名农场工人的眼睛中分离出一种高致病性禽流感 (HPAI) H5N1 病毒，该病毒通过接触奶牛而受到感染，该病毒对在高防护实验室环境中感染的小鼠和雪貂具有致命性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Research-identizes-respiratory-transmission-pottial-of-H5N1-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Research-identizes-respiratory-transmission-pottial-of-H5N1-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f418b38-d74a-4be2-8094-ced374cafafe Mon, 28 Oct 2024 22:34:54 -0400 Research identifies respiratory transmission potential of H5N1 virus
韦恩州立大学获得美国国立卫生研究院创新药物设计研究资助美国国立卫生研究院的一项拨款将帮助韦恩州立大学的研究人员探索使用计算机模型生产药物的新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Wayne-State-University-receives-NIH-grant-for-innovative-drug-design-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Wayne-State-University-receives-NIH-grant-for-innovative-drug-design-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fca8ec5-381c-4771-a5c0-e2aef7a9702c Mon, 28 Oct 2024 22:30:09 -0400 Wayne State University receives NIH grant for innovative drug design research
新资金旨在扩大新泽西学校的心理健康服务罗格斯大学教育研究生院 (GSE) 获得了 330 万美元的拨款，用于增加训练有素的学校辅导员的数量和多样性，以帮助填补新泽西州高需求学区的心理健康服务缺口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-funding-aims-to-expand-mental-health-services-in-New-Jersey-schools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-funding-aims-to-expand-mental-health-services-in-New-Jersey-schools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7178e939-15e0-4579-b969-b6f09c229687 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 22:27:32 -0400 New funding aims to expand mental health services in New Jersey schools
低出生体重婴儿的父母面临经济和就业挑战根据《美国医学会儿科杂志》发表的最新研究，早产或低出生体重婴儿的父母面临着巨大的经济和就业挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Parents-of-low-birth-weight-babies-face-economic-and-employment-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Parents-of-low-birth-weight-babies-face-economic-and-employment-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4036edc-493c-40c0-b645-e7fc0c4ec105 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 22:23:30 -0400 Parents of low birth weight babies face economic and employment challenges
研究人员揭示了 CRISPR 基因编辑的关键机制CRISPR/Cas9 是一种基因编辑工具，它彻底改变了生物医学研究，并催生了第一个 FDA 批准的基于 CRISPR 的基因疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Researchers-uncover-key-mechanisms-of-CRISPR-gene-editing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Researchers-uncover-key-mechanisms-of-CRISPR-gene-editing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48d9f90c-0ead-4031-9356-f37dc6d08912 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 22:19:16 -0400 Researchers uncover key mechanisms of CRISPR gene editing
三十年来老年人口黑色素瘤发病率不断上升皮肤恶性黑色素瘤（CMM）的患病率和死亡率一直在上升，特别是在老年人中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Elderly-population-faces-escalating-melanoma-incidence-over-third-decades.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Elderly-population-faces-escalating-melanoma-incidence-over- Three-decades.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ae2cc1a-0565-4263-a81c-a825df5cb524 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 21:53:57 -0400 Elderly population faces escalating melanoma incidence over three decades
新研究揭示致命神经内分泌前列腺癌背后的机制一位顶尖科学家对前列腺癌的发现导致了挽救生命的治疗方法，现在他揭示了一种新出现的、更致命的疾病形式：神经内分泌前列腺癌 (NEPC)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-research-unveils-mechanism-behind-deadly-neuroendocrine-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-research-unveils-mechanism-behind-deadly-neuroendocrine-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=650ca11f-58f7-47c3-976c-d7bf3d847447 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 21:50:10 -0400 New research unveils mechanism behind deadly neuroendocrine prostate cancer
